headline.main: GREECE AND SOVIET GIVE FASCISTS A SETBACK; Vigorous British Action Also Factor in Disrupting Axis Plans for Winter

lead_paragraph: ISTANBUL, Turkey, Nov. 30--Any picture of the war situation seen from this side of the Atlantic is just as liable to be distorted by proximity to one or the other of the theatres of war as a picture from the other side is likely to be befogged by distance. But viewed from Turkey, the past ten days ...
